alert.note: Alert for Shoshone, Lava Beds (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 3:54AM MST until January 14 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Shoshone, Richfield, and Carey. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 8 AM MST this morning. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 5 PM this afternoon to 8 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
